images.title: Product Dashboard Hero
images.prompt: A premium SaaS hero image on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E at 135 degrees). In the center, a large floating dashboard panel with 24px rounded corners showing a data visualization interface. The main card displays a line chart trending upward with primary indigo (#6366F1) fill and secondary cyan (#22D3EE) accent line. Three stat cards float nearby showing key metrics with large numbers and small percentage badges. A thin cyan connection line links the main panel to a glowing Acme hub node (rounded square with indigo glow). In the background, a subtle abstract grid rendered as thin cyan lines at 10% opacity with 32px spacing. Soft indigo and cyan glows highlight focal elements. No brand logos — only abstract shapes and data visualizations.

style.lighting: Soft top-left key light, strong indigo glow behind the main panel, subtle cyan flow along connection lines
style.ui_fidelity: High-fidelity product-style mockup, abstracted for marketing
style.focal_point: Central dashboard panel with glowing hub node

images.title: Analytics Dashboard
images.prompt: An Acme analytics dashboard floating over the deep fintech gradient background (#050816). The main card shows a world map on the left with three highlighted regions using cyan nodes and labels. On the right side of the card, a vertical comparison chart shows metrics before and after: split bars showing improvement from 60% to 72% with a green (#10B981) '+20% uplift' badge. Below, a small row of region chips displays granular data. Two smaller stat cards float nearby: one labeled 'Revenue' with a large green number, another showing 'Active Users' with a mini bar chart. Dark surface cards (#1F2937), white (#F9FAFB) and indigo text, cyan accent lines. A subtle 32px grid in the background reinforces structure.

style.lighting: Soft top-left light, gentle indigo glow behind main card, subtle reflections on card edges
style.color_temperature: Cool, with green for success metrics
style.focal_point: Comparison chart on the main card

images.title: Global Network Map
images.prompt: An abstract world map on a deep Acme background (#050816), focusing on global reach. Continents are outlined by thin hairline cyan grid lines. Over key regions, glowing nodes with short labels: 'NA / Primary', 'EU / Secondary', 'APAC / Expanding'. Each label sits inside a small rounded pill chip with 8px radius and subtle glow. All nodes connect via smooth curved cyan lines to a central Acme hub node near the center — a glowing 24px-radius rounded square with indigo (#6366F1) fill and a simple routing icon. Labels are short uppercase tags using white text. Low density with only key regions highlighted to avoid clutter.

style.lighting: Ambient glow from the central hub, secondary glows around key nodes
style.focal_point: Central Acme hub with radiating connections

images.title: Configuration Interface
images.prompt: A floating configuration panel representing Acme's settings engine on the dark gradient background (#050816). The card is a light surface (#F9FAFB at 95%) with 16px radius, framed by subtle indigo border and glow. At the top, an inline pill label 'Settings' and a dropdown. Below, three configuration rows displayed as chips with icons and colored tags (indigo and cyan). On the right side of the card, a small preview panel shows the resulting output. In the background, faint outlines of additional cards hint at more options. The composition is minimal and readable, with generous negative space.

style.lighting: Card appears slightly illuminated against dark background, subtle top-left light and soft shadow
style.color_temperature: Cool background with warm white panel
style.focal_point: Configuration list inside the main card

images.title: Integration Pipeline
images.prompt: A left-to-right pipeline diagram showing how Acme integrates into a workflow. On the far left, a card labeled 'Input' with a data icon. A cyan curved line flows into the center card labeled 'Acme', a 24px-radius panel glowing indigo with a processing icon. From the Acme card, the line exits to the right into a card labeled 'Output', depicted with a checkmark icon. Below the Output card, secondary cyan lines fan out to small chips labeled 'API', 'Webhook', 'Export'. Each stage has a short one-word label underneath: 'Collect', 'Process', 'Deliver'. The background shows a faint grid and minimal node dots. Clean system diagram aesthetic.

style.lighting: Ambient light with subtle glow on central Acme card, consistent down-right shadows
style.focal_point: Central Acme panel in the pipeline

images.title: Automation Workflow
images.prompt: A horizontal workflow diagram on the Acme brand background (#050816) visualizing an automation process. Five nodes from left to right: 'Detect' (sensor icon), 'Analyze' (chart icon), 'Decide' (gear + sliders icon), 'Execute' (play icon), 'Monitor' (dashboard icon). Each node is a dark rounded square card (#1F2937) with thin white border and small glow on the 'Decide' node. Smooth cyan flow lines connect the nodes with small arrows showing direction. Above the 'Decide' node, a tiny label reads 'Acme engine'. Below each node, one-word labels in uppercase. Minimal graphical style with just enough motion and color to feel alive.

style.lighting: Soft top-left light with extra glow around the 'Decide' node
style.ui_fidelity: Abstract but based on UI metaphors
style.color_temperature: Cool cyan and white on dark background

images.title: Before vs After Comparison
images.prompt: A side-by-side comparison on the Acme background (#050816). On the left, a dimmer card labeled 'Before' with a simple interface showing basic options. Underneath, a muted badge says '60% efficiency'. The card has a faint desaturated overlay. On the right, a bright card labeled 'With Acme' showing an enhanced interface with more features. Under this card, a green (#10B981) badge says '85% efficiency' with '+42% improvement' in smaller text. A subtle arrow bridges from the left card to the right card. The right card has an indigo glow and appears more elevated.

style.lighting: Even ambient light, with extra glow around the 'With Acme' card
style.color_temperature: Cool with warm warning tint on the 'Before' side

images.title: Developer API Snippet
images.prompt: A floating code editor mockup on the deep Acme background (#050816). The editor shows modern dark code UI with 16px rounded corners, three window dots at top-left, and soft shadow. Inside the editor, TypeScript-like code highlights a simple Acme SDK integration: calling 'acme.configure({ region: "us-east", mode: "production" })' and using the result. Syntax highlighting uses primary indigo (#6366F1) for keywords, cyan (#22D3EE) for strings, purple (#A855F7) for function names, and muted gray (#6B7280) for comments. To the right of the editor, a smaller panel shows the resulting JSON response. A few small icons (API, gear, bracket) float subtly around.

style.lighting: Code editor panel acts as main light source with subtle glow, ambient top-left light
style.ui_fidelity: Very high, realistic developer tool aesthetic
style.focal_point: Acme API call inside the editor

images.title: Pricing Tier Cards
images.prompt: Three pricing cards for Acme on the deep gradient background (#050816). Each card is a light surface (#F9FAFB) with 16px radius, soft shadow, and subtle border. Left card labeled 'Starter' with a simple icon and small caption. Center card labeled 'Pro', visually emphasized with a soft purple (#A855F7) glow and small 'Most popular' tag. Right card labeled 'Enterprise' with a building icon. All three cards show a large price line, followed by three bullet rows with checkmark icons. Spacing is generous; visuals are minimal, relying on hierarchy and color. Center card clearly stands out yet shares the same geometry.

style.lighting: Soft key light from top-left, center card has subtle purple halo, consistent down-right shadows
style.color_temperature: Cool with warm-ish white card surface

images.title: Abstract Network Background
images.prompt: A subtle abstract network background on the Acme gradient (#050816 to #0A0F1E), designed to sit behind content. Thin, low-opacity white lines form a sparse network of connections with smooth bezier curves. A small cluster of slightly brighter nodes is placed in the middle-left area. Three faint circular gradient spots in indigo (#6366F1) and cyan (#22D3EE) provide soft color variation, but overall contrast is low. No text, no UI elements, no logos. Enough detail to feel premium and intentional without distracting from overlaid content.

style.lighting: Very soft, evenly distributed ambient light, with faint glow on a few nodes
style.focal_point: No strong focal point — designed as supporting background
